This app requires root access to control the fan.

Your device is not rooted or root access has not been granted.

Please:
1. Root your device using Magisk
2. Grant root permissions to this app

The Magisk module is not installed.

Please:
1. Download the latest Magisk module zip
2. Flash it in Magisk Manager
3. Reboot your device

This app requires both root access and the Magisk module.

Please:
1. Root your device using Magisk
2. Flash the Magisk module
3. Reboot your device
